text: Micranthocereus auriazureus is a species of cactus. It is endemic to Brazil, where it is known only from Minas Gerais.Taylor, N.P., Machado, M., Braun, P. & Zappi, D. 2013. Micranthocereus auriazureus. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species 2013. Downloaded on 18 September 2015. ==References== Category:Endemic flora of Brazil auriazureus Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Micranthocereus auriazureus
